author: cbs8
title: North America Travel Trailers Market 2015-2019 - Focus toward design and aerodynamics of travel trailer
text:
Research and Markets
DUBLIN , Oct. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/8xp6wz/travel_trailers ) has announced the addition of the "Travel Trailers Market in North America 2015-2019" report to their offering.
The travel trailers market in North America to grow at a CAGR of 12.38% during 2014-2019.
This report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the travel trailers market in North America during the forecast period. To calculate the market size, the report considers the unit sales of travel trailers. In terms of product type, travel trailers can be categorized into four segments: toy haulers, expendable, teardrop trailer, and park model. The report presents the vendor landscape and a corresponding detailed analysis of the key vendors in the market. In addition, it discusses the major drivers that influence the growth of the market. It also outlines the challenges faced by the vendors and the market at large, as well as the key trends emerging in the market.
Travel trailer manufacturers, through changes in design and material, are focusing on improving the fuel economy of travel trailers. The next-generation travel trailers are compact, lightweight, and aerodynamically advanced with high fuel economy. Upcoming towable RVs, which constitute over two-thirds of RV sales in North America , have highly innovative designs with lightweight and durable building materials. Such RVs can easily be towed using small and mid-sized SUVs.
According to the report, Consumer buying pattern for travel trailers in the US depicts that a significant number of buyers opt for finance from banks for their purchase. Hence, the developments in the financing market will lead to an easy availability of credit that will drive the sales of travel trailers.
Further, the report states that a reason that might affect travel trailer sale in North America is the easy availability of used and rental travel trailers in the region. Travel trailers are not only available for first-hand purchases in North America but also as a pre-owned vehicle.
Key vendors
Eclipse Recreational Vehicles Forest River Gulf Stream Coach Heartland RV Northwood Manufacturing Palomino RV Thor Industries Universal Trailer Other prominent vendors
Aliner and Somerset Folding Camping Trailers Allied Recreation Group Augusta RV Coachmen Recreational Vehicle Cruiser RV DNA Enterprises Forks RV Grand Design RV Great West Vans HL Enterprises Jayco Lance Camper Let's Go Aero Little Guy Worldwide Prime Time Manufacturing Renegade RV Skyline Spartan Chassis Starcraft RV Winnebago For more information visit http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/8xp6wz/travel_trailers
